bibl.title: R.C. SENIOR and A.S. HOLLIS, A Tax Receipt from Hellenistic Bactria.
bibl.note: Piece of parchment recently donated to The Ashmolean Museum, Department of Eastern Art. Tax receipt, dated in the reign of Antimachus, Eumenes and Antimachus. Provenance unknown, second century BC. - A. The text (J.R.), pp. 261-267. - B. The discovery of the document (R.C.S.), pp. 267-268. - C. Historical and numismatic thoughts on the Bactrian tax receipt (A.S.H.), pp. 268-280.
bibl.seg: REA John, R.C. SENIOR and A.S. HOLLIS, A Tax Receipt from Hellenistic Bactria.

Piece of parchment recently donated to The Ashmolean Museum, Department of Eastern Art. Tax receipt, dated in the reign of Antimachus, Eumenes and Antimachus. Provenance unknown, second century BC. - A. The text (J.R.), pp. 261-267. - B. The discovery of the document (R.C.S.), pp. 267-268. - C. Historical and numismatic thoughts on the Bactrian tax receipt (A.S.H.), pp. 268-280.
